com.nhn.android.mapviewer.overlay

Class NMapOverlayManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nhn.android.mapviewer.overlay.NMapOverlayManager

  • public class NMapOverlayManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages overlay layers on map view.

      • createPathDataOverlay

        public NMapPathDataOverlay createPathDataOverlay()
        Create a new NMapPathDataOverlay. The create NMapPathDataOverlay is added to this overlay manager and returned. Path data should be added by addPathData() or addCircleData().
        Parameters:
        pathData - an instance of NMapPathData contains all path data.
        Returns:
        created overlay
